articles.author: Emma Roth
articles.title: Apple will reportedly launch AirPods with USB-C in September - The Verge
articles.description: Apple could release a pair of AirPods with support for USB-C during its event this September, according to a report from Bloomberg’s Mark Gurman.
articles.content:
Apple will reportedly launch AirPods with USB-C in September
